full_summary:
## [Rescue Boat] Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Reference: PW_HAL_308_11588
#### Amendment Reference: 1
#### Solicitation Date: October 7, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date and Time: October 27, 2022, 13:00:00

#### Project Overview
Parks Canada requires the supply and delivery of a rescue boat and trailer to Kejimkujik National Park and National Historic Site in Nova Scotia.

#### Summary of Requirements
* Supply and deliver a rescue boat and trailer to the specified location with a delivery date of no later than March 10, 2023
* Non-security related procurement
* Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Process
* Interested suppliers can submit bids for this project
* Tender documents available through the Buy and Sell Government of Canada website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders)
* Firms must confirm their intention to bid and identify any issues or clarifications required in writing to the Contracting Authority at least 5 calendar days prior to the closing date

#### Contact Information
Contact Name: Rachelle LaBrash
Contact Email: [rachelle.labrash@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:rachelle.labrash@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
Contact Phone: (902) 401-2080
Contact Fax: (902) 496-5016
Contact Address: 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, NS, B3J 1T3

#### Procurement Details
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid
* Tendering procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* Delivery Date: March 10, 2023

#### Additional Information
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Tender Cancellation
This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 5P122-210292/A, dated November 26, 2021, with a closing date of December 14, 2021 at 14:00 AST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.  Let me know if you need me to explain anything.  I'll be here
